thread.title: Room for tariff negotiations eased investors' fears, says Barbara Reinhard

title: Room for tariff negotiations eased investors' fears, says Barbara Reinhard
text:
Room for tariff negotiations eased investors' fears, says Barbara Reinhard 3:05pm EDT - 05:33 
Voya Financial's head of asset allocation also tells Reuters' Fred Katayama she's overweighting Europe and emerging markets. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
